title: Everything Changed After I Died
summary:
My funeral has begun.

“How can she not shed tears when her twin sister died?”

“I heard she’s an idiot, so the rumors must be true.”

“I heard she has an inferiority complex. Who knows, maybe she is happy inside.”

I died of poison. And overnight I became Mergen’s burden, Irene.

You said you wanted to live like me? No, Irene. You shouldn’t live like that.

***

“You’re not going anywhere without my permission, Noona.”

Since when did Abel, who treated Irene like a bug, start calling me Noona?

“Keep your promise. Our deal isn’t over yet.”

My ex-fiancé, with whom I had a strictly business relationship, started treating Irene like the old me.

“I don’t care what it is. I’m a vulgar mongrel, unlike you, so I can digest whatever I swallow.”

Why does the Grand Duke, whom I thought was the enemy, do this?

The attitudes of the three men are puzzling. It is said that there are no permanent enemies or allies, but has there ever been a time when things were so unclear as now?

title: To the Witch Who Forgot the Birds
summary:
He wanted to live. He wanted to live meaningfully.
He didn’t want to ruin his life by making rash choices.
What on earth should he do? How should he be free… … .

‘There are too many people here who want to manipulate me as they please.’
If there’s something you want, you have to fight for it.
‘It doesn’t matter who it is. If it’s a goddess, I’ll kill her. If it’s heaven, I’ll tear it apart.’
If there’s something you long for, you have to face it.
‘I can do it.’
Rather than living your whole life tied up like a dog, you have to risk death and break the leash.

That’s what you taught me.
So Victoria.
“Just be free.”

title: The Baby Concubine Wants to Live Quietly
summary:
I possessed a supporting character in a reverse harem novel. A young concubine who, in the end, was driven to death for treason after begging for attention from the regnant empress who was the female lead, and doing wicked things to the male leads who were the concubines. Despite everything, the fortunate thing was that I possessed her right after entering the Imperial Palace. Even if everyone in the Imperial Palace were wary of me, they didn’t hate me yet.

‘Let’s not be impudent, and be obedient.’

I obstinately didn’t need nor have the mindset of trying to be loved by the Empress. Although the male leads who were the concubines were giving me glances, I could just lie flat. Since it wasn’t even a very difficult thing, I really did so. It was definitely like that, but–

“Come to my bedchamber tonight. I’ll read you a fairy tale book!”

“P-please don’t cry. I’ll give you this.”

Just why is everyone’s attitude endlessly gentle? I couldn’t understand. And it was baffling.

‘…I don’t need it though?’

I wasn’t really a young kid lacking affection. And that gaze in which they looked at me as if I were the loveliest in the world was extremely uncomfortable. Just where would I use a fairy tale book that’s full of jewels and silk, and the magic pearl which is the Imperial family’s heirloom? Since it’s already been done, I just wish for everyone to get out of my palace.

---
In the nation of Seora, Yehwa Aryun is the Empress Regnant, and her court is full of consorts with special powers. The newest member of the imperial court is 8-year-old Sanya Yeoran. And although she has no powers, Sanya actually has the mind of an adult who knows exactly what will happen in this fantasy world, because she already read about it in her past life. Thanks to that, she comes up with a plan to avoid her tragic execution: stay away from Yehwa and her jealous consorts at all costs!

title: My Villain Fiancé is Interfering With My Flowery Path
summary:
A fake saint born from a misinterpretation of trust. A swindler who deceived the empire. Abandoned by her family, she envied the real saint and committed all sorts of evil deeds before dying as a villain.

That was my role in the original work.

After learning that I was reincarnated into a book, I made up my mind. I can’t live in this country anymore; it’s too filthy and dangerous. The only solution is exile!

In order to go into exile, I had to live innocently without any criminal charges. I aimed for a smooth path, just living as a good person. Without killing anyone, without envying anyone.

But something is strange.

Despite not doing anything like that this time, news of accidents involving extras who used to mock me in the original work keeps coming in every day.

title: I Became the Wicked Beastman’s Catnip
summary: Reborn as the prophesied savior of a feline tribe, a former lab victim vows to atone by helping them survive, then leave. But her plans unravel when the tribe’s proud princes, who should’ve been distant, begin circling her like curious cats.

title: I Became the Daughter of the Ghost Duke
summary:
Theresia Oblene, eight years old.

As her dead mother’s things which she left were taken hostage, she was threatened by her wicked biological father and was forced to be adopted by the Ghost Duke family.

“But he only told me to go to be adopted, right? He didn’t tell me not to have this adoption undone, did he?”

Now that it has become like this, I’ll leave my name behind as the fastest child to get a dissolution of adoption in the history of the Empire.

===

An heir’s duty? What’s that? Is it something to be eaten?

It was my plan to become a lout and get kicked out on purpose.

Until I met the Ghost Duke who was cursed.

[Let me do this kind of thing as a parent, Terry.]

[I will become the Miss’ wooden horse!]

[Thank you, Miss!]

The Duke is too kind, and the employees are too sweet.

If so… then change of plans!

I decided to raise the Duke Family which is doomed, and buy the whole Viscount family.

Shouldn’t I use the ability to see ghosts at times like this?

But…

[Hey, you. If you keep pretending not to know… I will tell the ghosts of the mansion that you can see ghosts.]

My ability was found out by some ghost possessing a teddy bear.

Will… I be able to survive here safely?

title: Since When You Were The Villain?
summary:
She was possessed by a book without knowing what novel it was. Then, one day, her fiance appeared. ‘Killian’ was a perfect Northern Duke with black hair, red eyes, and a handsome face. It was a contract marriage. ‘I can see that person is the male protagonist even if I rolled backwards…’
So, Sophia believed without a doubt. She thought he would be the male protagonist. But…
“Ah, I got caught.”
The smell of blood came on the tip of her nose. Killian’s eyes narrowed. Then she realized the fact that he was a villain.And a cold hand caressed her cheek.
“There won’t be a breakup, Sophie.”
Raising the corners of his lips slightly, he whispered softly. ‘I think this is also a cliché… I hate that cliché!’

title: Surviving as an Illegitimate Princess
summary:
"Don't look down on me just because I'm a child! Even though I look like this, this is my 10th life!"

I'm an illegitimate princess whose life was cut short after being misunderstood for having the same blood as the enemy country and died early. After nine tragic repetitions, I discovered the identity of my biological father. He is Paeon, a war hero who defeated the demon king and the strongest holy knight in the continent. He had a forbidden relationship with the princess, had me, and then deserted me!

In order to survive the harsh royal palace, I've decided to use and then abandon this impudent father. I will become the strongest as fast as I can and escape from this disgusting country!

And so, while I was building my strength, I happened to meet the demon king's son, Leo. He wasn't arrogant like his father, but he was pitifully living in captivity. So, I took care of him in secret.

"Asha, you cannot get engaged to anyone."

"...Huh? Why?"

"Because I’ll take responsibility for you forever."

"What?!"

"We spent the night together."

...What is this prince saying?

A holy knight father who had (?) a forbidden love. Along with an enemy prince who is trying (!) to have a forbidden love. With them, can the unfortunate princess change her fate?

---
As an illegitimate princess, Anastasia Entimos has died in just about every way imaginable. Every time she dies, she is brought back to the moment of her birth and forced to relive her tragic fate. It is only in her 10th life that she discovers her father is the esteemed knight and war hero, Paeon Parschel! Determined to escape her miserable fate once and for all, Anastasia vows to use her aloof father as a stepping stone to freedom. Will the 10th time be the charm for this ill-fated princess?

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55912087), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8639242)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%82%AC%EC%83%9D%EC%95%84-%EA%B3%B5%EC%A3%BC%EB%A1%9C-%EC%82%B4%EC%95%84%EB%82%A8%EA%B8%B0/2966), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59761866)

* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%88%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AA/437)

title: Golden Light Gratia, The Child Loved By God
summary:
Gratia, a girl considered useless and despised by her family, has a revealing dream where a mysterious man predicts a great future for her. She soon discovers that she is the lost daughter of the influential Luciffero family. In a surprising event, after being attacked, a golden light erupts from Gratia, forcing everyone around her to close their eyes.

When the light dissipates, young Gratia disappears and in her place an adult version of herself appears, with distinct features of Luciffero. With an imposing stature and undeniable beauty, she comes across Nea, her mother, and realizes that the transformation expected for the future happened that day.

This was the moment when ten-year-old Gratia and twenty-year-old Gratia switched bodies for the first time.

title: Duke Please Fail!
summary:
I really died after working to death under the Duke of Alterwood.
When I opened my eyes, it was the past, and I vowed to take revenge on the death of overwork.
As long as I'm the caretaker, the duke will die and I'll ruin the unlivable estate!
I spent a lot of money on the wrong budget.

I was going to leave the field to a famous boomer to ruin the farming...

"This is the first time we've had such an amazing harvest, right?""
"Thank you. You saved us!""

Strangely, things keep going well!
And this time, I took revenge on the duke directly.

“Once you touch it, you have to take responsibility.
I need you, Nelly.”

Is this counterproductive? No, I still have to get revenge.
Duke, please screw up!

title: YoKai Yokai Yokai!
summary: Rikuo Nura is descended from Nurarihyon, Grand Master of the spirit world, but appears to be just a normal kid. He usually just wants to live peacefully as a human, but when his friends and allies are in trouble, his spirit blood boils, and he transforms into Nurarihyon to wipe out evil! A new concept story combining spirits and chivalry! A piquant, gallant ghost action story!

title: Melin’s Salvation Plan
summary:
I suddenly woke up in the body of Melinia, a supporting character and the first love of Male Lead A from "Azuli's Magnificent Misfortune." 

Since I know how this tragic tale ends, I decided to do what I can to stop the ultimate destruction of the kingdom from the male leads. But the more I try to fix things, I can't help but notice that the storyline seems to veer farther away from what I read. 

Will this plan of mine work? Or will it just cause more harm than the original?

title: Choose your husband Carefully
summary:
After her mother's death, Elrose Basellan was cast out by her father for 14 years. With news of his passing, Elrose rushes to claim her inheritance, but can't do so unless she's married! Desperate, she prays for a husband, and the mysterious Rakshan seems to fall from the sky! They agree to a temporary union that benefits them both, but unexpected issues keep delaying their plans for divorce. Will this fake marriage become something more? Or should Elrose have chosen her husband more carefully?

---
After her mother’s death, Elrose is left alone in a monastery, while her father stripped of her of her fortune. When news of his passing reaches her, she must flee the monastery and marry within hours to claim her rightful inheritance and title. Desperate, she prays for a husband and fate brings a man to her feet. Little does she know that this man is Lachsann, the man who stole her money. Despite her mother’s warning to “choose a husband carefully,” she can’t do so in this situation and proposes to Lachsann.

“Do you have no intention of repaying me, except for your body?”

Unbeknownst to her, Lachsann isn’t just any man but the emperor’s brother and the king of mercenaries, Harkhan.

title: I Don’t Want To Be a Magpie Bridge
summary:
I’ve been reincarnated into a side character of a novel. On top of that, I am the character who is like a magpie bridge in the mentally-exhausting story, *The Guys Around Hestia*.

There is no romance in store for me, and it absolutely horrifies me to think that my family is destined to drown in debt!

I planned on becoming a civil servant, enjoying a life of wealth and honor that I was unable to attain in my previous life but… why are the guys behaving out of character? Why are you blushing in front of me? Why do you keep giving me food?

“Can you Imagine Shushu being shy when looking at someone?”

“Whoa… It’d be amazing if that happens.”

As Cory absent-mindedly said that to Hiley, Eve frowned and murmured under his breath, “Should I run away with her…”

Swan remained silent while he hid his face with his sleeves. His face and ears turned red.

What’s up with you guys? Why are you guys doing other things instead of being obsessed with the female lead? Get yourself together!

This is the survival story of an academy student, Schulaina West, who wants to pursue a wealthy future in a reverse harem novel. 

TL/N: Magpie Bridge is the bridge made by a flock of magpies that connects the two star-crossed lovers Orihime and Hikoboshi in the legend behind the Tanabata festival.

title: The Princess’s Double Life
summary: Marie, a domineering and selfish princess, faced her end under the guillotine's blade after her subjects had enough of her. Yet, after dying,  Marie finds herself back a year in the past, discovering that no matter what she does she can never escape the fate that awaits her in a year. Eventually, after Marie learns that the only way to escape her own execution is to conquer a large swathe of 'romantically troubled' women, she decides to use her own 'royal charisma' to build a yuri harem!

title: Surviving As A Maid
summary: After being transported to another world with all of his classmates, Yoshitsune was ordered to conquer the dungeon as a hero. While his peers were all reeled in and tamed by the offer of unlimited sex with the castle maids, Yoshitsune, a low-rank hero, devoted his cheat skills to getting more and more maid wives...

title: Beauty and the Beasts
summary:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?

title: Evil Dragon Is Reincarnated! Revenge Begins at the Age of Five!
summary: I was once the legendary red dragon who stood at the top of the world. For thousands of years, my brethren have been murdered by humans and the desire for revenge slowly turned into my only mission in this world! However, I failed. On the day of the decisive battle against human beings, I died with hatred in my heart... if there is an afterlife, I will definitely avenge my kind. If there is an afterlife, I will make these filthy humans pay with their blood! If there is an afterlife—hmm? I was reincarnated as a weak human baby?!!

title: Romance in the Beast World
summary: This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them. That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power...?

title: Baby Princess Through the Status Window
summary:
Princess Chervianne Aerveldote has lived a lonely life, and now she's being put to death for a crime she didn't commit. However, her execution turns out to be a fresh start when she wakes up as her 5-year-old self with an ability to read people's thoughts with status windows. Chervianne quickly learns how badly she misjudged everyone in the past, finding affection and betrayal in unexpected places. But will her newfound insight be enough to change her story and finally find love in her life?

---
I was condemned as a cruel villain and sentenced to death. But somehow, I was transported back to the past when I was a five-year-old child. The moment I faced my father, who looked much younger now, a strange blue window appeared before my eyes — it was a pale blue window that revealed another’s inner self.

[Alderuan Erveldote]
Role: Emperor (Lv.99)
Favorability: 90,980,984
Mood: Dear daughter I miss you

…But Father...? I assume it’s Dad's feelings but… What the Hell is going on?

[Damian Erveldote]
Mood: Glad to see my sister
Thoughts: I want to talk to you T ^ T

[Ellie]
Mood: Holding back from breaking the wall because it’s too cute
Thoughts: I’ll definitely make a commemorative collection titled “The Daily Life of a Cute Princess!”

[Karmen Kasselov]
Mood: Excited
Thoughts: Why is it that every time I see you, you are one step more beautiful? What do they feed you at my palace? Do they have a magic potion that can make everyone this beautiful?

I used to think that everyone held a grudge against me, but seeing how they treat me like that I guess that’s not true?! If what the status window tells me is true then maybe I can live a better life in this lifetime!

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/57183975)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%83%81%ED%83%9C%EC%B0%BD-%EB%B3%B4%EB%8A%94-%EC%95%84%EA%B8%B0-%ED%99%A9%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/3053), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60402003)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26364&contentId=364&platform=IA)
* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/1184)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Status-Window-to-the-Soul/638)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/128062)

title: When Love Calls My Name
summary:
Mariène is troubled by the transformation of her cold-blooded and merciless husband, Duke Alexia.
After a solitary marriage confined to his mansion, he suddenly proposes to her once more and dotes on her as "his goddess"!
He presents her with bouquets of flowers covered in jewels every day, and seduces her with the heart-pounding techniques of romance novels.

A redemptive love fantasy between a cold-blooded duke who found love by returning from death and an unfortunate, calm, goddess-like wife!

---
* [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2039hs/)

title: I Don’t Want the Male Lead’s Child
summary:
I reincarnated as Luna, a supporting character who is accused of ruining the heroine and hero’s relationship, and is murdered. I’m not interested in someone else’s man, but the heroine’s friends bully me every day.

*“Why are you trying to get close to someone who’s already taken?”*

*“That’s right, please stop! Why are doing this?”*

*“Stop doing such terrible things!”*

So Luna decides to announce it in front of everyone: “I don’t want someone like Fersen even if you beg me to take him so stop bothering me. I’d rather date Anthes Vincent, who’s rumored to be insane.”

And soon she meets someone who she never expected to meet…

“I heard you have an interest in me? The truth is, I do too. Is it a coincidence?”

title: The Real Daughter is Back
summary:
Louise is a noble lady who loves books and magic devices. One day, she suddenly had her fiancé stolen by the very same twin sister she was acting as. After her dream to be a magic device researcher was destroyed, the one to save her was her first love, the First Prince Lucius, whom she was able to meet again! From a book club in a secret library to outings to magic device shops, Louise manages to regain the light in her eyes with the time they spend together. With her feeling her heart beat from Lucius's sweet words, just when you'd think they'd get together in no time, the past that the 'substitute lady' doesn't want to be known becomes an obstacle. 

“What do you think about this?”
(No... I couldn't possibly tell him about that.)

On the other hand, Louise’s potential as a researcher is also starting to bloom...?

---
Louise, a noble lady who loves reading and researching magic tools, leads a double life pretending to be her twin sister. Suddenly one day, her fiancé breaks off their engagement and chooses to be with her sister instead. All seems lost to her when she also has to give up her dream of becoming a magic tool researcher, but a reunion with her first love, the first prince Lucius, saves her from her misery. As they spend time together reading books in the hidden archives and looking around at different magic tool shops, Louise slowly regains her confidence. On top of that, her heart flutters every time unconsciously sweet words leave the prince's mouth. The mood is perfect and it seems like it's seconds before they can finally be together, but the past she wants to keep hidden gets in the way.

"How...do you feel about me?"
(He asks, but... I can't do it. I can't tell him.)

Meanwhile, her potential as a researcher begins to blossom and leads to... A true love fantasy full of misunderstandings between a magic tool-obsessed noble lady and a stoic older prince awaits!

title: Tiger Cub
summary:
The kid next door came back as an adult. What he is aiming for.. is my ♡♡..?!

Choi In-ho, the kid next door who took care of him when he was young, appears in the basement of this ordinary office worker. Due to In-ho's fraud (?), he suddenly ends up living in the basement.

Inho, who has been in love with the kid since his childhood, tries to seduce him, but fails once and for all..

What do we do to flirt with this dull brother?!

title: The Goal is to be Self-made
summary: Stuck in a loveless engagement with the crown prince and tired of living in the violent capital city, Violet Hale wanted a way out of her miserable life. Enter the enigmatic archduke Cedric Etchell, who breaks off her engagement and agrees to a contractual marriage with her as thanks for saving his estate. Determined to make it on her own once the contract ends, Violet starts her own business. Love isn't in the plan, but could the archduke make this self-made lady have a change of heart?

title: Rejecting The Perfect Marriage
summary:
The Tezen ducal family, wielding the utmost power, and O’Hara County, possessing all the wealth in the world—their union could not have been more perfect than this.

Except there was no burning love.

“Evangeline O’Hara is a prepared duchess. It would be troublesome to find another woman now, and there is no guarantee that she would do as well as Evangeline.”

For Dekarno, there was no Duchess better than her.

So, if it was only about bankruptcy, he could bear with it.

However, she couldn’t.

“Let’s put an end to this, now.”

“…Are you suggesting canceling the engagement?”

“Yes.”

Evangeline had given up everything she had brought so far and now walked away barehanded.

By relinquishing everything, she could let go of that man, too.

Even the feelings she had held alone.

“I liked you, Your Grace.”

“….”

“No way. Your Grace didn’t think I was only coveting the position of Duchess, did you?”

How could she leave so easily after claiming she liked him? Dekarno couldn’t understand, and his anger boiled inside.

The increasingly entangled events, the complicated thoughts—all of it traced back to that woman.

In the end, there was no choice but to put everything back in its place.

He set out to find Evangeline, who was desperately trying to stand on her own.

“You claim you’ll survive. It’s unbearable for a mere human like me to endure.”

title: Please Marry Me Again, Husband!
summary:
Gun-ha and So-yeon were strongly attracted to each other, but because they lived completely different lives their marriage ended short and eventually they chose to divorce.

Five years later, Gun-ha proposes to Seo-yeon again to be a ‘contract couple’.
“Please marry me again. This time, we stay as an ordinary couple.”

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/the-remarriage-contract/list?title_no=3227)

title: I’m Ready for Divorce!
summary:
Medi is a runaway former saint who can turn into a wolf and she now lives inside a forest. One day, she took care of a cute young boy who got lost in the woods and helped return him home once the boy started feeling better.

Ten years later, a beautiful young man visited her home saying, "I'm looking for the wolf that had helped me here in the past."

His name is Claude and it seems that he's the boy she had helped before! She can't admit to him that she is the wolf and in her attempt to cover it up, she somehow ended up volunteering to help him look for the wolf instead?!

---
**Original Web Publication:** [Palcy](https://palcy.jp/comics/1306), [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/7895)
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/s0651f/)

title: Cheating Men Must Die
summary:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."

title: The Reason for Avoiding Him, the Perfect One
summary:
"Absolutely no way to fall for this man! Why is he so unnecessarily beautiful and sweet?" Yoon-ji, entered the world of the novels that she used to write herself, and
her pen name 'Marie', which only she knew, became the name everyone called her. While possessing a beautiful character's body, she dreams of a sweet romance, but she ends up getting entangled with the second prince, Enrique, who is destined to ruin her! "Where did I go wrong?!" A real different world survival romance!

title: Unrequited Love Defense
summary:
There are times in our youth that are awkward, messy, and unforgettable that stay with us forever. In the heart of adolescence, this is the story of first love. 

Mingyu has quietly loved his childhood friend, Jiwoo, for as long as he can remember.
Every time she laughs, complains, or casually drifts closer, his feelings deepen slowly but surely. The problem? Jiwoo has always had a thing for a very specific type: big, muscular "beast-like" guys. That's the total opposite of Mingyu. Thankfully, she’s never seriously liked anyone in real life so Mingyu has stayed in his role as the dependable “guy friend,” standing loyally by her side. But one calm autumn day, his peaceful world is shattered. “Joo Mingyu… I think I’m in love.” Out of the blue, Jiwoo falls head over heels for Kang Taemin, the captain of the school volleyball team. Now faced with the terrifying possibility that this might be her first real love, Mingyu realizes: it’s do-or-die. Determined not to lose her, he sets out on a last-ditch mission to become her ideal type… even if it means becoming a swole “muscular man” overnight!

title: Youth Lovesome
summary:
"It may be hazy blue, but that's alright"

Taking place a year after the epilogue of Seasons of Blossom, this story focuses on the new opening of “Cafe Blossom and NEMONE Atelier” as well as Bomi’s new classmate “Pureum” as they explore a new found youth. 

Campus romance, after school romance, office romance, it has it all.  

The heartwarming series is back with another youthful story!

title: Return of The Genius Swordmaster
summary: When war-orphan-turned-warrior Agrick dies on the battlefield, his last regret is that he never got to fully develop his talents. The next moment, he's reborn... into a family of geniuses! Now, as Dane Sogress, he has to choose to be a spearman like his father, an assassin like his mother, or a summoner or mage like his sisters. But instead of picking, Dane decides to learn it all! Can Dane finally become the master of skills he was meant to be? Or will his take two at life end in failure again?

title: Emperor of Solo Play
summary:
Betrayed by his guild and defeated by a top player, Hyrkan loses everything. Before he can get revenge, a fatal accident ends his life — only for him to wake up years in the past, back at the start of Warlord. 

Now, with his memories intact, he’s determined to rise to the top alone. But in a game where power means everything, can he truly survive without any allies? 

The Emperor of Solo Play is back, and this time, he’s playing by his own rules.

title: The Ultimate Shut-In
summary:
Neet van Avadora, the second prince of the great kingdom of Astoria, is a homebody who loves nothing more than staying indoors. After cutting himself off from the outside world for years to devote himself to magical research, he has, without even realizing it, grown into a true prodigy of magic.

One day, however, under orders from his father the king, Neet is forced, much against his will, to enroll in the Magic Academy. There, he gradually begins to enjoy student life, blessed with quirky but kind friends. But because of his overwhelming magical talent, he constantly finds himself caught up in one troublesome incident after another…!

Meanwhile, Alex, the first prince, and the very cause of Neet’s growth into an unknowing genius, sets a certain “plan” into motion. This plan will spark a great incident, one that will change not only Neet’s fate, but also the fate of the entire kingdom of Astoria…

title: Absolute Sword Sense
summary:
For as long as he can remember, Woonhwi So has been the black sheep of his family and clan. Because his spirit core has been destroyed, he has no choice but to serve as a third-rate spy for the Blood Cult.

One day, during his mission to find the legendary Blade Scroll, he is killed and sent 10 years into the past. When Woonhwi regains consciousness, he realizes that he has been sent back to the day he was kidnapped by the Blood Cult, and that he has gained a mysterious ability to hear the voice of a dagger.

title: Sleeping Ranker
summary:
“We’re only taking a break for about 30 seconds? I’m not imagining things, right?”
 “…Yes.” 

After 15 hours of hunting, Hyunsung asked to rest for a while, and after 30 seconds, he had to get up again and started hunting.
Actually, Hyunsung has a special skill.

[Thananos’ narcolepsy skill is activated.]
[You’re being forced into a sleep state.]

After sleeping for a while and waking up, I got an item? 
Pay close attention to the story of the God-Rank Class, the descendant of Thananos, the unstoppable Hyunsung.

title: I have Max level luck
summary: The main character "Ryuya"  is told that he has no skills and is abandoned by his friends. The only way for him to compete with those possessing skills is to raise his level. After five years of training in the forest, he has raised his level to 8 million. Due to his excessively high level, he is beyond the reach of skilled humans, demons, or even gods.

title: The Delivery Man From Murim
summary: Stranded in a new world, Smiley Kang covertly lives the life of a delivery man. Until now, humanity has fended off demonic beasts and their portal “gates.” There are the Awakened, citizens imbued with supernatural abilities, and there are those more scheming, fighting to monopolize and claim demonic resources. But as the number of gates starts to rise, the world is at risk once again. Can humanity survive another onslaught of demonic beasts? The answer lies with the mysterious delivery man…

title: How To Become A Dark Hero’s Daughter
summary:
The MC transmigrated into a novel and became an extra from the novel. The novel is a murder thriller and the main character is a serial killer. He kills criminals with black magic making him a dark hero (think of him as Dexter or batman with dark magic). She (MC) doesn't have any death flags since she’s a background extra but she was a homeless girl of all things in such a dangerous novel. Somehow our MC saves the male lead and to thank her, he adopts her.

“Become my daughter.”

The richest, most powerful, and handsome duke asks her to be his child. The MC is freaked out since she knows he’s a cold blooded killer. Can she survive such a maniac? Yet he dotes on her and constantly says ‘my daughter is the cutest’! He wants to get master artists to draw her and gather poets to describe her adorableness. The duke also has a son. The apple doesn’t fall far from the tree; he also dotes on her. In this way, a beggar became a little princess. She also got used to people getting killed.

However there was still one problem. Our MC has turned sixteen and is wondering as a lady, will she have an arranged marriage? The whole house atmosphere quickly turns awkward. She realizes, perhaps they want her to stay here forever? Can she escape such a strange house? Everyone is so attached to her!

---
Duke Kallen de Lewelton is bloodthirsty and ruthless when it comes to killing criminals, but a total sucker when it comes to his new daughter! Peasant girl Lae learns this herself when a fateful run-in with the duke results in her adoption into the Lewelton home. Armed with a sharp mind and the knowledge from her past life, Lae makes the perfect addition to the family’s quest to quell injustice. But as the mysteries of the capital’s underbelly rise to the surface, will she and her new family withstand the return of a true criminal mastermind?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%ED%81%AC-%ED%9E%88%EC%96%B4%EB%A1%9C%EC%9D%98-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%B2%95/2541), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57514873)

title: The Tyrant’s Family Lasts Thanks To Her Inner Voice
summary: After being struck to death by someone falling from the sky, Jiu Jiu found herself causing a commotion in the King of Hell’s palace. To resolve the chaos, the King of Hell allowed her to enter the world of a book, where she became a princess. However, she was no ordinary princess—she was confined to the cold palace. From the start, due to the heroine’s slander, her tyrant father decided to sentence her to death. Jiu Jiu was left speechless, thinking to herself: “No wonder the Xi Chu kingdom collapses 10 years later. With such an indiscriminate tyrant, the fact that it even lasts 10 years is a miracle.”

title: Only for Love
summary:
Rintarou, the boy I've been friends with since we were small. Large, grim, popular. He turned down a girl again… What a waste!

“No, because I love you.”

…Huh? What!? That's the first time I've heard about this!!! W-w-w-why me-

Damn…!!! I can't believe he would confess to me. I feel like I lost and it's frustrating. Now that it's come to this, I'll test him and see if he's good enough to be my boyfriend!!

title: Me, The Heavenly Destined Villain
summary:
Gu Changge, a traveller from another world, comes to realize that he is the villain in this world. However, with his noble background, unrivalled abilities, and a cheat system that penalizes the protagonist, he is ready to steal the protagonist’s thunder and win the female lead’s heart…

---

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Breakers
summary:
We ended up at a concept bar on a whim for the afterparty, and it turned out to be full of seriously tall women.

It’s a manga where the customers have a casual conversation with the big ladies they meet at the bar.
The conversations mostly revolve around appearances and the relationship dynamics between people.

title: My Hot Harem Has Turned Cold On Me!
Beyond Walpurgis
summary:
During the mid-19th century in Prussia, Dr. Maria Faust, known as the 'Witch of Könihilsberg' who made a pact with the devil Mephistopheles, meets Martin, a curious young man who dreams of becoming a novelist, while on a journey to find 'a way to bring the dead back to life'. . 

Faust is once knocked down by the villain Valentin, who was hostile to him, but rises again with the help of Martin, who admires her, and his student Wagner.

After that, Faust finds the truth he has been looking for, but he also realizes his mistakes... In the end, Faust finally feels the joy of life by saving the dying.

Was she really a witch?

title: I Adopted a Male Lead From a Prison Shelter
summary:
In a universe ripped from the pages of a story, Siena Robert, a self-aware villainess, strives to rewrite her fate. Daughter of a man running a therianthrope shelter, she discovers Ivan Levdilin, the captivating male lead, detained within. Aware of her scripted demise when Ivan's father arrives for his rescue, Siena defies her villainous destiny. She showers Ivan with kindness, a stark contrast to the original Siena's cruel persona. Her actions shield Ivan from her father's cruelty and forge an unscripted bond between them that changes their destiny in an unforeseen direction. 

---
She possessed Sienna Lovett, the villain of the tragic novel. The greatest leader of the Tigers in the original novel when his Tiger Clan abandoned him for being a mutant, but that didn’t last long before the Duke came looking for his son. I’ve convinced my father to let him live with us somehow, but now I just need to succeed in protecting Ivan until the Duke comes… But when the Duke arrives, the unexpected happens. “I’ll take she too.” huh? I? Do I really want to continue living with my father?

title: Dear, Not Cunning Witch
summary:
Talent doesn't always run in the family.
In an age ruled by science, there remain almighty witches with mythical powers. However, Diana ended up lacking any of her mother's witchly talent. In fact, ever since she began training at the age of 7, her only goal was to reunite with her sister. But life never turns out how we want, does it?
